text: While CB1 & CB2 get the most attention, other receptors in the body also respond to cannabinoids, like TRPV1 & GPR55. #Research on TRPV1 & GPR55 shows cannabinoids may hold promise in treating #cancer & Dravet syndrome. https://t.co/SaTbnR0YXU #Epilepsy #cannabis #marijuana https://t.co/pEqrQr9clL
